title: 235. Andy & DJ CTI: Russia Investigates Nike, Sandy Hook Families Lawsuit Settlement & Ottawa Police Chief Resigns
itunes:title: 235. Andy & DJ CTI: Russia Investigates Nike, Sandy Hook Families Lawsuit Settlement & Ottawa Police Chief Resigns
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss Russia investigating Nike for anti-white discrimination, the Sandy Hook families settling for $73 million in court, and the Ottawa police chief resigning in the wake of the Canadian COVID protest.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss Russia investigating Nike for anti-white discrimination, the Sandy Hook families settling for $73 million in court, and the Ottawa police chief resigning in the wake of the Canadian COVID protest.
